item.name: confirm_delete
item.message: Do you really want to delete the marked guestbook entries?

item.name: create_error
item.message: While creating the guestbook entry an error has occured.

item.name: create_success
item.message: The guestbook entry has been created successfully.

item.name: delete_error

item.name: delete_success

item.name: edit_error

item.name: edit_success
item.message: The guestbook entry has been edited successfully.

item.name: mod_description
item.message: With this module you can administer the guestbook.
